named-query.name: BC_READ_TARGET_CONTENTS_BY_PRIORITY
named-query.query: SELECT targetContent FROM org.broadleafcommerce.marketing.domain.TargetContent targetContent WHERE targetContent.priority = :priority AND SYS_DATE > targetContent.onlineDate AND targetContent.offlineDate > SYSDATE

named-query.name: BC_READ_TARGET_CONTENTS_BY_NAME_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT targetContent FROM org.broadleafcommerce.marketing.domain.TargetContent targetContent WHERE targetContent.contentName = :name AND targetContent.contentType = :type AND SYSDATE > targetContent.onlineDate AND targetContent.offlineDate > SYSDATE ORDER BY priority, online_date desc
